channel.title: Hacks on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Hacks on ZooBerry

item.title: AA Options XML File
item.description: Unlocks campaigns and challenges in African Adventures.

item.title: Better Trainer
item.description: Improves training efficiency for marina animals.

item.title: ES Stuff Unlock
item.description: Unlocks campaigns and challenges in Endangered Species.

item.title: Everything Unlocked Hack
item.description: Unlocks campaigns and challenges in ES, AA, and MM.

item.title: Forever Food and Poop-B-Gone
item.description: Keeps food bowls full and eliminates poop in Zoo Tycoon 2.

item.title: Free Staff
item.description: Makes all staff free to hire and maintain.

item.title: Long Lasting Koi Hack For MM2
item.description: Extends the lifespan of koi in Marine Mania.

item.title: Moveable Animal Babies Statue
item.description: This hack makes the animal babies statue moveable.

item.title: Moveable Everything for ES and AA
item.description: Allows all in-game items to be moveable.

item.title: Movie Stopper
item.description: Stops the splash movies from playing when loading Zoo Tycoon 2.

item.title: ST Icon Compatibility
item.description: Prevents ST Icon from interfering with official Marine Mania icons.

item.title: The Baby Update
item.description: Updates baby models for certain animals.

item.title: Zoo Zoom The Camera Out Hack
item.description: Allows overhead camera to zoom out further.

item.title: ZT2 Completed Scenarios/Challenges Unlock
item.description: Unlocks campaigns and challenges in Zoo Tycoon 2.

item.title: ZT2 With AA Only Options XML
item.description: Unlocks the campaigns and challenges in African Adventures.

item.title: Domesticated Status for Slice's Boer Goat
item.description: Adds a “domesticated” status to the Boer Goat.

item.title: SZE CombiPatch
item.description: A patch that combines several hacks into one.

item.title: Reptilia Part 1 Space Hack
item.description: Reduces the space requirements for some reptiles in ZT ABC’s REPTILIA user-made expansion.

item.title: AVES Part 1 Space Hack
item.description: AVES Space Hack P1 reduces the space requirements for several animals in the AVES expansion pack listed below.

item.title: No Zoo Wall Hack
item.description: Makes the zoo wall invisible, perfect for photography and Show & Tell threads.

item.title: Highland Cow Moorland Hack
item.description: Moves the highland cow to the Moorland biome.

item.title: Montane Forest Hack
item.description: This will move the spectacled bear, mountain gorilla, and puya plant to the Montane Forest biome.

item.title: Realistic MM2 Biomes Hack
item.description: This hack adds more realistic foliage and rock details to the Marine Mania biomes (Benthic, Coastal, Pelagic and Reef).

item.title: zFixSunia
item.description: This hack fixes hippos, pigs (warthogs), and peccaries to not chew their cud.

item.title: zHackWorldLocs
item.description: This hack adds a bit of flavor to the globe by spreading out the Tundra zoos and moving the Polar Coast zoo to the coast.

item.title: EA Biome Objects Hack
item.description: A hack that modifies the biome objects from Extinct Animals.

item.title: Pink Elephant Disorder Fix
item.description: Summary of the Pink Elephant Disorder Fix project

item.title: Compatibility Hack Plus EA
item.description: This makes all official ZT2 animals, sans exception, be comfortable in any biome and with any space.

item.title: Compatibility Hack
item.description: This hack makes all the ZT2, ES, AA and MM animals, plus the black panther, the asian elephant, the musk ox and the addax 100% comfortable in any biome and with any space.

item.title: Guest Limit Hack
item.description: Increases the guest limit.
